properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 14 at 4:22AM EST until February 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
waves 6 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY
